Hello! I would like commnunity input from a change in DataFramesMeta.

Currently, the way to work with `Symbol`s is with `^(_)`, i.e.

```julia> @transform(df, b = ^(:A))
2×2 DataFrame
 Row │ a      b      
     │ Int64  Symbol 
─────┼───────────────
   1 │     1  A
   2 │     2  A```
I want to change this, in favor of

```julia> @transform(df, b = syms(:A))
2×2 DataFrame
 Row │ a      b      
     │ Int64  Symbol 
─────┼───────────────
   1 │     1  A
   2 │     2  A```
I think this will be less confusing and easier to work with `^` using math.

Do people agree? Please comment here: <https://github.com/JuliaData/DataFramesMeta.jl/pull/228>
